titleStmt.title: Fatal love, or, The forc'd inconstancy a tragedy acted at the Theatre Royal / written by Elkanah Settle ...
titleStmt.author: Settle, Elkanah, 1648-1724.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Based on a Greek romance by Achilles Tatius, Clitiphon and Leucippe.
